document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of the Quill mites (Acariformes: Syringophilidae) of the World

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Columbiphilus
Kivganov and Sharafat, 1995
: 82
;
Picobia,
Bochkov & Mironov 1998
: 15
. Type-species:
Columbiphilus khushalkhani
Kivganov and Sharafat, 1995
, by original designation.

alectoris (
Fain, Bochkov and Mironov, 2000
)
,
Picobia alectoris
Fain, Bochkov and Mironov, 2000
: 65
, figs. 103– 109 ;
Columbiphilus alectoris , Skoracki 2011 b: 374
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Holotype female at MRAC ( 187373 ).

Hosts and distribution.
Alectoris sp.
( type host) ( Galliformes : Phasianidae ), type-locality: RWANDA (
Fain et al. 2000
);
Alectoris rufa
( Phasianidae ), FRANCE , ( AMU ) (Skoracki & Sikora 2011 ). Habitat. Unknown.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
khushalkhani (
Kivganov and Sharafat, 1995
)
,
Columbiphilus khushalkhani
Kivganov and Sharafat, 1995
: 83
, fig. 2 ;
Picobia khushalkhani,
Bochkov & Mironov 1998
: 16
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Holotype female at OCU (G-N- 18 ), female paratypes at OCU. Hosts and distribution.
Columba livia
( type host) ( Columbiformes : Columbidae ), type-locality: AFGHANISTAN , Kabul (
Kivganov & Sharafat 1995
).

Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (Syr. 322 ), paratypes : females, nymphs at ZSM . Hosts and distribution.
Colinus cristatus leucopogon
( type host) ( Galliformes : Odontophoridae ), type-locality: COLOMBIA , Bogota (Skoracki & Sikora 2011 );
Colinus cristatus
( Odontophoridae ), SURINAME , Zanderij, ( AMU ) (Skoracki & Sikora 2011 ), COLOMBIA , Cauca Popayan, ( AMU ) (Skoracki & Sikora 2011 ). Habitat. Body feathers.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
polonica (
Skoracki, Magowski and Dabert, 2001
)
,
Picobia polonica
Skoracki, Magowski and Dabert, 2001
: 154
, figs. 1–9 .;
Columbiphilus polonica , Skoracki 2011 b: 375
, figs. 280–283 .

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (Syr. 9 ), paratypes : females, males, nymphs at ZMH , USIMC , CNCI . Hosts and distribution.
Gallus gallus domesticus
( type host) ( Galliformes : Phasianidae ), type-locality: POLAND , Wielkopolska, Zasutowo, (
Skoracki et al. 2001 c
); GERMANY (Skoracki 2011 b, Skoracki & Sikora 2011 ), USA , Kansas, Wyandotte Co., Kansas City, Rosedale, ( FMNH ) (Skoracki et al . 2014 b);
Gallus sonneratii
( Phasianidae ), INDIA , ( AMU ) (Skoracki & Sikora 2011 ).

pteroclesi
(

),
Picobia pteroclesi
Skoracki and OConnor, 2010
: 27 , figs. 78–88 ;
Columbiphilus pteroclesi , Skoracki 2011 b: 379
, figs. 284–286 .

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Holotype female at UMMZ ( BMOC 83 -0307- 33 ), paratypes : females, males, nymphs at UMMZ , AMU , ZISP .
